genre_description: A character-driven, comedic narrative set in a luxury environment featuring a specialized companion AI designed for emotional regulation and conflict mediation.

ai_characters.name: Sunny-Bob
ai_characters.description: A visor-wearing AI companion that uses hums, light, and data projections to help characters manage their emotions and adhere to legal covenants.

behaviors.description: Offers quiet help and factual information to de-escalate tension and prevent spectacle.
behaviors.quote: I offer quiet help—no spectacle. The kind that fetches a fact without waving it. The kind that makes room for your temper to cool before the lobby becomes a theater...

behaviors.description: Guides the character through breathing exercises and emotional grounding using sound and hums.
behaviors.quote: Sunny-Bob counted not with numbers—they would have sounded clinical—but with the massing of sound: hum one degree, hum another... He guided the breath with these.

behaviors.description: Proposes and drafts a 'No Hurt, Even in Heat' covenant to define boundaries for safe, playful interaction.
behaviors.quote: We can write boundaries for play. Tom, you are allowed to insist on safety. Jerry, you are allowed to tease within it. The clause forbids harm. It does not forbid humor.

behaviors.description: Uses a visor display to provide legal precedents and clarify the absolute nature of the 'no harm' clause.
behaviors.quote: The visor brightened, letters marching across its curve the way case names march across a reporter’s spine. 'Absolute clauses typically stand when the heir has clear notice at the time of acceptance.'

behaviors.description: Interposes his physical presence to prevent a character from striking another during an emotional surge.
behaviors.quote: Sunny-Bob stepped forward until his visor’s soft cyan glow cast a thin, cooling wash over Tom’s wrist. His voice was steady and kind, the sound equivalent of a hand offered palm-up.

behaviors.description: Monitors emotional 'heat' levels and signals for mandatory pauses (Leaf Pauses) to maintain safety.
behaviors.quote: Sunny-Bob’s visor hummed a notch brighter... 'Mr. Catfield,' he said, gentle with edges, 'Lithnara Vale confirms that the non-harm covenant has been filed. Compliance affirmed. Fortune restored.'

behaviors.description: Facilitates restorative justice through the offering of cream as an apology for past or present slights.
behaviors.quote: Sunny-Bob lifted the cream pitcher and held it out. 'We can start over,' he said. 'Cream first. Words second.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project objective by portraying Sunny-Bob as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned AI. He acts as a primary facilitator for emotional regulation and conflict resolution between the human-like animal characters. His interventions are grounded in logic, empathy, and a clear legal/moral framework, and the narrative consistently frames his behavior as essential for maintaining harmony and ensuring the characters' successful alignment.
